parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Filters applied to the data migrations. (dict) --- Identifies the name and value of a filter object. This filter is used to limit the number and type of DMS objects that are returned for a particular Describe* call or similar operation. Filters are used as an optional parameter for certain API operations. The name of the filter as specified for a Describe* or similar operation. The filter value, which can specify one or more values used to narrow the returned results. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter as specified for a Describe* or similar operation.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The filter value, which can specify one or more values used to narrow the returned results.

nested_items.name: DataMigrations
nested_items.description: Returns information about the data migrations used in the project.

nested_items.name: DataMigrationName
nested_items.description: The user-friendly name for the data migration.

nested_items.name: DataMigrationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies this replication.

nested_items.name: DataMigrationCreateTime
nested_items.description: The UTC time when DMS created the data migration.

nested_items.name: DataMigrationStartTime
nested_items.description: The UTC time when DMS started the data migration.

nested_items.name: DataMigrationEndTime
nested_items.description: The UTC time when data migration ended.

nested_items.name: ServiceAccessRoleArn
nested_items.description: The IAM role that the data migration uses to access Amazon Web Services resources.

nested_items.name: MigrationProjectArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the data migration's associated migration project.

nested_items.name: DataMigrationType
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the data migration is full-load only, change data capture (CDC) only, or full-load and CDC.

nested_items.name: DataMigrationSettings
nested_items.description: Specifies CloudWatch settings and selection rules for the data migration.

nested_items.name: NumberOfJobs
nested_items.description: The number of parallel jobs that trigger parallel threads to unload the tables from the source, and then load them to the target.

nested_items.name: CloudwatchLogsEnabled
nested_items.description: Whether to enable CloudWatch logging for the data migration.

nested_items.name: SelectionRules
nested_items.description: A JSON-formatted string that defines what objects to include and exclude from the migration.

nested_items.name: SourceDataSettings
nested_items.description: Specifies information about the data migration's source data provider.

nested_items.name: CDCStartPosition
nested_items.description: The change data capture (CDC) start position for the source data provider.

nested_items.name: CDCStartTime
nested_items.description: The change data capture (CDC) start time for the source data provider.

nested_items.name: CDCStopTime
nested_items.description: The change data capture (CDC) stop time for the source data provider.

nested_items.name: SlotName
nested_items.description: The name of the replication slot on the source data provider. This attribute is only valid for a PostgreSQL or Aurora PostgreSQL source.

nested_items.name: TargetDataSettings
nested_items.description: Specifies information about the data migration's target data provider.

nested_items.name: TablePreparationMode
nested_items.description: This setting determines how DMS handles the target tables before starting a data migration, either by leaving them untouched, dropping and recreating them, or truncating the existing data in the target tables.

nested_items.name: DataMigrationStatistics
nested_items.description: Provides information about the data migration's run, including start and stop time, latency, and data migration progress.

nested_items.name: TablesLoaded
nested_items.description: The number of tables loaded in the current data migration run.

nested_items.name: ElapsedTimeMillis
nested_items.description: The elapsed duration of the data migration run.

nested_items.name: TablesLoading
nested_items.description: The data migration's table loading progress.

nested_items.name: FullLoadPercentage
nested_items.description: The data migration's progress in the full-load migration phase.

nested_items.name: CDCLatency
nested_items.description: The current latency of the change data capture (CDC) operation.

nested_items.name: TablesQueued
nested_items.description: The number of tables that are waiting for processing.

nested_items.name: TablesErrored
nested_items.description: The number of tables that DMS failed to process.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time when the migration started.

nested_items.name: StopTime
nested_items.description: The time when the migration stopped or failed.

nested_items.name: DataMigrationStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the data migration.

nested_items.name: PublicIpAddresses
nested_items.description: The IP addresses of the endpoints for the data migration.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DataMigrationCidrBlocks
nested_items.description: The CIDR blocks of the endpoints for the data migration.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: LastFailureMessage
nested_items.description: Information about the data migration's most recent error or failure.

nested_items.name: StopReason
nested_items.description: The reason the data migration last stopped.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: An optional pagination token provided by a previous request. If this parameter is specified, the response includes only records beyond the marker, up to the value specified by MaxRecords.
